Uses of Class
albus.core.Instances

  • Packages that use Instances 
    Package Description
    albus.core
    Provides classes and interfaces for handling datasets and attributes.
    albus.core.io
    Contains classes for reading and writing datasets.
    albus.core.processor
    Provides classes for processing datasets.
    albus.feature.selection
    Contains classes for feature selection.
    albus.predictor
    Provides interfaces and classes for predictors.
    albus.predictor.evaluation
    Provides classes for evaluating predictors.
    albus.predictor.function
    Provides classes for simple functions, such as univariate/bivariate functions.
    albus.predictor.gam
    Provides algorithms for fitting generalized additive models (GAMs).
    albus.predictor.gam.interaction
    Provides algorithms for feature interaction detection.
    albus.predictor.gam.tool
    Provides tools for diagnosing and visualizing GAMs.
    albus.predictor.glm
    Provides algorithms for fitting generalized linear models (GLMs).
    albus.predictor.tree
    Provides algorithms for tree-based methods.
    albus.predictor.tree.ensemble.ag
    Provides algorithms for fitting additive groves (AGs).
    albus.predictor.tree.ensemble.brt
    Provides algorithms for fitting boosted regression trees (BRTs).
    albus.predictor.tree.ensemble.rf
    Provides algorithms for fitting random forests (RFs).
